page.title: 11Mattingley Area - Industry.
page.content: The only real industry in the block is the{saw-mill & joinery works}situated in the claypits of the old brickyards at{Hazeley Bottom.}The company STD was located here in 1964 & did all types of joinery & made roof trusses, doors & window frames etc. for houses. In 1982 the business was split into two companies. 1 -{Merrowbrook}continued to make truss-rafters for houses within a 50 mile radius. 2 -{STD {Holbrow Ltd.}started the more specialised manufacture of high quality 'H' window frames. These are made in both hardwood or softwood materials & both Top 'H' & Side 'H' {window frames}are produced for domestic & commercial buildings.
